name: booking-app-monorepo
description: Full-stack booking application with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: cd backEnd && npm install && npm run build:safe
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontEnd && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backEnd && npm install && cd ../frontEnd && npm install
scripts.test: cd backEnd && npm test && cd ../frontEnd && npm test

author: BookingApp Team
